text: this is Irwin and I lost a hundred
pounds to lead a healthy travel
lifestyle
[Music]
Irwin is half French half Filipino who
was born and raised right here in Manila
we met briefly years ago and I finally
found time to catch him again and share
his story with you it's a story of
perseverance a story of not giving up
Irwin basically grew up eating
everything he could get his hands on and
therefore it led him to gaining a lot of
weight at my peak when I was 21 I
weighed 250 pounds I don't recognize
this guy anymore at the time he was
dealing with a breakup and was just fed
up with his weight so he wanted to lose
it
since he always had a passion for
cooking he crafted his own weight loss
program the diet he adopted eventually
led him to lose 75 pounds in three
months and then gradually lost 20 more
pounds over the next two years it was
focusing on low fat proteins fresh
vegetables no starch and no sugar
Irwin is also an avid traveler having
visited 50 countries as you and I both
know it's really hard to maintain a
healthy diet on the road and it's
something I struggle with a lot but Iran
has found the answers when I'm traveling
I like to just look for vegetables and
freshly protein right now we have tuna
in broccoli going wherever you go in the
world they will always have their local
vegetables and they will always have
their local proteins all you gotta do
add some salt some pepper still frying
is your best friend low calories lots of
nutrients you look at food as fuel and
not necessarily as a source of
entertainment he also became addicted to
fitness with most of his workouts being
on the road so here are three things I
like to do when I travel and try to stay
fit push-ups burpees
stair jumps and finally after all that
find a really steep hill and just run it
until you're exhausted all-out sprints
best thing about these art it doesn't
cost you anything you just need a good
pair of shoes and a Road Runner
naturally our one combined his love of
food health and travel into his website
called the fat kid inside so I started
it in 2011 as a way to share my weight
loss tips and journey to people and now
it's evolved into production and
creative agency that focuses purely on
food and travel he's also an outstanding
video content creator sharing amazing
recipes and travel stories food is a
very personal endeavor he has eight
million social media followers and has
amassed hundreds of millions of video
views it's been awesome getting a
glimpse into Aarons world and he's
definitely up to something special now I
finally feel inspired to get my in shape
staying healthy while traveling is
probably one of the hardest things to do
but life in general is hard it comes
down to you making that decision
and sticking to it
[Music]
[Applause]
since secretly sidenote I haven't eaten
lunch yet and everyone just made this
amazing concoction of broccoli and tuna
and yeah definitely a try
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
